SEARCH

Package app.utilities

package app.utilities
This package contains utility classes that help print the game elements. These utilities process inputs from game and the player, and renders a visual representation for the game to be more enjoyable.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    app
    Root package for the Parade game.
    app.entity
    Contains classes representing human and bot entities within the game, including their attributes.
    app.game
    Contains classes for managing the gameplay.
    app.network
    This package contains the classes that help to connect and run the game online.
    app.resource
    This package contains the resources classes such as cards and decks and the parade.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ANSIColor
    Contains the 6 ANSI colors codes for the cards
    AppUtils
    Helper class to generate Bot players to add to the game
    CardList
    Manages a list of lines, used for printing a pretty card.
    Input
    This class contains utility methods for handling user inputs.
    Printer
    This class contains static methods that display the game state, player hands, the parade, the cards, scoring zones, and the game splashscreen.
    Render
    This class contains utility methods for rendering text images our cards and the scoring zone.
